title: WTB N162 Beecher or N302 Mayo
author: westwin

posts.post_title: WTB N162 Beecher or N302 Mayo
posts.post_content:
I know they aren't technically baseball but does anyone by chance have, or know of someone who has, an 1888 N162 Goodwin Champions Harry Beecher (Football) for sale? It's on my bucket list and thought I'd check.  Would also be interested in an 1894 N302 Mayo card if someone has one.
Thanks,
Chris

[IMG]https://prewarcardsdotcom.files.wordpress.com/2018/10/n162-beecher.jpg?w=860[/IMG][IMG]https://cconnect.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/1894-Mayo-Cut-Plug-Football-Anson-Beard.jpg[/IMG]
